channel.title: [C#] Database [C#]
channel.description:
Hey i am makeing a somewhat database to store info on a certian thing, but there is much i need to know before i can do that :
1.How can i get it to search for text in a listbox 2.how can i get C# to prompt the user with a text box when they click an "add" button 3.How can i make a file to get c# to remember the contents of a listbox 4.How can i make a file to remember info on a particular item 5.How can i edit the text of a file
I know thats a lot
Thanks.
